pilot_training: The airline operates its own Qantas Group Pilot Academy, which provides world-class training for its pilots.
Qatar Airways offers a Cadet Pilot Training Program to develop future airline pilots.
Emirates offers pilot training through the Emirates Flight Training Academy (EFTA) for experienced and cadet pilots.
Cathay Pacific offers pilot training through its own Cathay Pacific Flight Training Centre (CPFTC).
Turkish Airlines has a flight academy that trains pilots for the airline: The Turkish Airlines Aviation Academy (TAAA).
EVA Air offers pilot training through its subsidiary, the EVA Flight Training Academy (EVA FTA).
Vietnam Airlines offers pilot training through its Cadet Pilot Program at the 43 Air School.
Swiss offers pilot training through the European Flight Academy (EFA).
All Nippon Airways (ANA) does not offer pilot training directly, but it does partner with flight schools to train its pilots.
Alaska focuses on recruiting and training pilots with no experience.
Lufthansa offers pilot training through the European Flight Academy (EFA).
British Airways offers pilot training through its Speedbird Pilot Academy.
Finnair Flight Academy offers pilot training courses for qualified pilots.
Hawaiian Airlines has a pilot training program at its flight school in New Smyrna Beach, Florida.
Delta Air Lines offers pilot training through the Propel Flight Academy.
Air Canada does not offer pilot training, but it does have a pilot induction training (PIT) course for new hires.
American Airlines offers pilot training through its American Airlines Cadet Academy.
Korean Air partners with the Flight Education Center at Korea Aerospace University to train pilots.
TAP Air Portugal has a pilot training center at the Cascais Municipal Aerodrome.
Air New Zealand invests heavily in pilot training and development, contributing to its reputation as one of the safest airlines in the world.
United Airlines operates its United Aviate Academy, which trains aspiring pilots and provides pathways to becoming part of the United Airlines team.
Iberia offers a pilot training program called Iberia Cadetes.
Japan Airlines (JAL) offers pilot training at its training center in Haneda Airport, Tokyo.
easyJet offers a pilot training program called Generation easyJet.
Sky Airline does not offer pilot training.
VietJet Air offers pilot training through its own training programs, including cooperation with various international training organizations.
Ryanair has a pilot training program called the Future Flyer Academy.
airBaltic offers pilot training through its Pilot Academy.
IndiGo Airlines offers pilot training through the IndiGo Cadet Pilot Program.
Frontier Airlines offers pilot training programs, including the Frontier Airlines Pilot Cadet Program.
Wizz Air offers a pilot training program called the Wizz Air Pilot Academy (WAPA).
The Dubai-based airline has a training center and a full-flight simulator facility.
HK Express has a pilot training program in partnership with the Hong Kong International Aviation Academy (HKIAA).
Volaris has partnered with Airbus to manage the training programs and ensure they meet all regulatory requirements.
Jetstar Airways has a pilot training program called the Jetstar Cadet Pilot Program.
AirAsia offers a cadet pilot program. The program is designed to train aspiring pilots to become Multi-Crew Pilot License (MPL) holders and Second Officers for the airline.
WestJet offers pilot training through its Flightpath Pilot Program at its campus in Calgary, Alberta.
Vueling Airlines offers pilot training through its Cadet Pilot Programme and Mentored Airline Pilot Scheme (MAPS).
Cebu Pacific has a pilot training program in partnership with Airworks Aviation.
Southwest Airlines offers pilot training programs through the Destination 225° program.
Air Arabia offers pilot training through its A320 Airline Pilot Training Programme and its MPL Cadet Pilot Program.
Jet2 offers pilot training programs, including a Pilot Apprentice program and direct entry positions.
Sun Country Airlines offers pilot training programs such as the Sun Country Direct Program, the College Bridge Program, and an in-house training program.
